ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ONElist
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, Onelist was bought up by Egroups, and then Yahoo bought Egroups. If you want to edit your information you go to www.yahoogroups.com It will ask you for
ygData.messageBody:
Well, Onelist was bought up by Egroups, and then Yahoo bought Egroups.
If you want to edit your information you go to www.yahoogroups.com
It will ask you for your email address to login-- I think.
If you don't currently have an account with yahoo you have to transfer your
egroups account (which was automatically transferred by onelist) to yahoo.
You can then edit your options.
luv,
-Su

I signed up when this was with onelist and I dont have a damn clue how to
change receiving options or remove myself from the list.. any suggestions?
and when did this turn into Yahoo? i never paid much attention to the junk
at the bottom
